import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-instructions', templateUrl: './instructions.component.html', styleUrls: ['./instructions.component.scss'] }) export class InstructionsComponent { }

Columns with icons

Featured title

Paragraph of text beneath the heading to explain the heading. We'll add onto it with another sentence and probably just keep going until we run out of words.
